descriptions.LittleFootstepsChildcareVoucher: Digital childcare voucher that unlocks subsidized hours for families enrolled in Little Footsteps.
descriptions.LittleFootstepsParentID: Identity credential attesting to a verified caregiver relationship and enrollment status.
descriptions.LittleFootstepsStaffLicense: Professional license attesting to background checks and childcare certification for staff.

policies.revocation: Ledger entry is appended to the transparency ledger and corresponding credential status endpoint is updated.
policies.refresh: Childcare vouchers are refreshed every 90 days based on updated donation pool balance.
policies.governance: Updates require multi-sig approval recorded in the transparency ledger.
